Articles.Content:
Hello, fellow kerbonauts.

A rapid search on the forum/the internet shown no results.

I did uninstall / reinstall the game, without much improvement.

My problem is : various mkII spaceplane (made in  ksp 1.05) with inline mk2 clamp-o-tron have a trouble when reaching 1500 - 2000meters high and 150-200 m/s surface speed.
On screen, the mkII clamp-o-tron disappear, and the view change, just as if this part was now way behind the plane.

Any guess about this issue ? Shall I post some screenshot ?
